name: Scale Spikes
target: one living creature/level that is a reptile, has the dragon type, or has the reptilian subtype, and that also has a natural armor bonus of at least +1
text: When the target is affected by this spell, its scales grow jagged spikes. These spikes act like +1 armor spikes. The subject is automatically considered proficient with these scale spikes.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料/法器（一小根刺）
target_zh: 一个拥有职业/角色等级的爬行生物，龙类或者爬行亚种的活物，并且至少拥有1点天生护甲。
text_zh: 当目标受到此法术时，它的鳞片长出了锯齿状的尖刺。这些尖刺如同+1甲刺。目标自动视为擅长这些鳞刺。
